document.h3: Learn the basic skills to visualise your ideas
document.p: Sketching is the basis of every design process. Scribble early ideas to communicate with yourself and others. It is the ideal method for rapid prototyping, without spending much time on presentations.
The workshop gives insight in various sketching techniques, using pen on paper as well as digital tools.

ul.li: Sketch the pages of some future publications;
Sketch a series of info-graphics, visualizing narrative and data;
Sketch abstract processes, such as a website design.
